title: Chapter Frontmatter Schema
description: Schema for validating Docusaurus chapter frontmatter.

title.description: The main title of the chapter.

sidebar_label.description: The label displayed in the Docusaurus sidebar.

estimated_time.description: Estimated time to complete the chapter (e.g., '2 hours').

week.description: The week number this chapter belongs to.

module.description: The module title this chapter belongs to.

prerequisites.description: List of slugs/titles of prerequisite chapters.

learning_objectives.description: Specific learning goals for the chapter (Bloom's taxonomy verbs recommended).

assessment_type.description: Type of assessment for the chapter (e.g., 'Quiz', 'Lab').

capstone_component.description: Indicates if the chapter includes a capstone project component.
